text: The Netherlands Antilles competed at the 1972 Summer Olympics in Munich, West Germany. Two competitors, both men, took part in two events in two sports. ==Shooting== One shooter represented the Netherlands Antilles in 1972. ;50 m rifle, prone * Bèto Adriana ==Weightlifting== ==References== ==External links== *Official Olympic Reports Category:Nations at the 1972 Summer Olympics 1972 Summer Olympics Category:1972 in the Netherlands Antilles
title: Netherlands Antilles at the 1972 Summer Olympics
